00061 std::string TQualityMetric::get_name() const

00065 
00066 bool TQualityMetric::evaluate_internal( PatchData& pd,
00067                                         size_t handle,
00068                                         double& value,
00069                                         size_t* indices,
00070                                         size_t& num_indices,
00071                                         MsqError& err )
00072 {
00073   const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handle );
00074   const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handle );
00075   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( e );
00076   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00077   unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00078   const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00079   
00080   bool rval;
00081   if (edim == 3) { // 3x3 or 3x2 targets ?
00082     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00083     if (!mf) {
00084       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00085       return false;
00086     }
00087 
00088     MsqMatrix<3,3> A, W;
00089     mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, indices, mDerivs3D, num_indices, A, err );
00090     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00091     targetCalc->get_3D_target( pd, e, s, W, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00092     const MsqMatrix<3,3> Winv = inverse(W);
00093     const MsqMatrix<3,3> T = A*Winv;
00094     rval = targetMetric->evaluate( T, value, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00095 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00096     print_info<3>( e, s, A, W, A * inverse(W) );
00097 #endif
00098   }
00099   else if (edim == 2) {
00100     MsqMatrix<2,2> W, A;
00101     MsqMatrix<3,2> S_a_transpose_Theta;
00102     rval = evaluate_surface_common( pd, s, e, bits, indices, num_indices,
00103                                  mDerivs2D, W, A, S_a_transpose_Theta, err ); 
00104     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00105       return false;
00106     const MsqMatrix<2,2> Winv = inverse(W);
00107     const MsqMatrix<2,2> T = A * Winv;
00108     rval = targetMetric->evaluate( T, value, err );
00109     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00110 
00111 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00112     print_info<2>( e, s, J, Wp, A * inverse(W) );
00113 #endif
00114   }
00115   else {
00116     assert(false);
00117     return false;
00118   }
00119   
00120   return rval;
00121 }
00122 
00123 bool TQualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00124                                              size_t handle,
00125                                              double& value,
00126                                              std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00127                                              std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00128                                              MsqError& err )
00129 {
00130   const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handle );
00131   const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handle );
00132   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( e );
00133   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00134   unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00135   size_t num_idx = 0;
00136   const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00137   
00138   bool rval;
00139   if (edim == 3) { // 3x3 or 3x2 targets ?
00140     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00141     if (!mf) {
00142       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00143       return false;
00144     }
00145 
00146     MsqMatrix<3,3> A, W, dmdT;
00147     mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, mIndices, mDerivs3D, num_idx, A, err );
00148     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00149     targetCalc->get_3D_target( pd, e, s, W, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00150     const MsqMatrix<3,3> Winv = inverse(W);
00151     const MsqMatrix<3,3> T = A*Winv;
00152     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_grad( T, value, dmdT, err );
00153     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00154     gradient<3>( num_idx, mDerivs3D, dmdT * transpose(Winv), grad );
00155 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00156     print_info<3>( e, s, A, W, A * inverse(W) );
00157 #endif
00158   }
00159   else if (edim == 2) {
00160     MsqMatrix<2,2> W, A, dmdT;
00161     MsqMatrix<3,2> S_a_transpose_Theta;
00162     rval = evaluate_surface_common( pd, s, e, bits, mIndices, num_idx,
00163                              mDerivs2D, W, A, S_a_transpose_Theta, err ); 
00164     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00165       return false;
00166     const MsqMatrix<2,2> Winv = inverse(W);
00167     const MsqMatrix<2,2> T = A*Winv;
00168     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_grad( T, value, dmdT, err );
00169     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00170     gradient<2>( num_idx, mDerivs2D, S_a_transpose_Theta*dmdT*transpose(Winv), grad );
00171 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00172     print_info<2>( e, s, J, Wp, A * inverse(W) );
00173 #endif
00174   }
00175   else {
00176     assert(false);
00177     return false;
00178   }
00179   
00180     // pass back index list
00181   indices.resize( num_idx );
00182   std::copy( mIndices, mIndices+num_idx, indices.begin() );
00183   
00184     // apply target weight to value
00185   weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, grad.empty() ? 0 : arrptr(grad), 0, 0, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00186   return rval;
00187 }

00189 
00190 bool TQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00191                                             size_t handle,
00192                                             double& value,
00193                                             std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00194                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00195                                             std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00196                                             MsqError& err )
00197 {
00198   const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handle );
00199   const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handle );
00200   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( e );
00201   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00202   unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00203   size_t num_idx = 0;
00204   const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00205   
00206   bool rval;
00207   if (edim == 3) { // 3x3 or 3x2 targets ?
00208     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00209     if (!mf) {
00210       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00211       return false;
00212     }
00213 
00214     MsqMatrix<3,3> A, W, dmdT, d2mdT2[6];
00215     mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, mIndices, mDerivs3D, num_idx, A, err );
00216     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00217     targetCalc->get_3D_target( pd, e, s, W, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00218     const MsqMatrix<3,3> Winv = inverse(W);
00219     const MsqMatrix<3,3> T = A*Winv;
00220     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_hess( T, value, dmdT, d2mdT2, err );
00221     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00222     gradient<3>( num_idx, mDerivs3D, dmdT*transpose(Winv), grad );
00223     second_deriv_wrt_product_factor( d2mdT2, Winv );
00224     Hessian.resize( num_idx*(num_idx+1)/2 );
00225     if (num_idx)
00226       hessian<3>( num_idx, mDerivs3D, d2mdT2, arrptr(Hessian) );
00227     
00228 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00229     print_info<3>( e, s, A, W, A * inverse(W) );
00230 #endif
00231   }
00232   else if (edim == 2) {
00233 #ifdef NUMERICAL_2D_HESSIAN
00234     // return finite difference approximation for now
00235 
00236     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle,
00237                                            value, indices, grad, Hessian,
00238                                            err );
00239 #else
00240     MsqMatrix<2,2> W, A, dmdT, d2mdT2[3];
00241     MsqMatrix<3,2> M;
00242     rval = evaluate_surface_common( pd, s, e, bits, mIndices, num_idx,
00243                              mDerivs2D, W, A, M, err ); 
00244     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00245       return false;
00246     const MsqMatrix<2,2> Winv = inverse(W);
00247     const MsqMatrix<2,2> T = A*Winv;
00248     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_hess( T, value, dmdT, d2mdT2, err );
00249     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00250     gradient<2>( num_idx, mDerivs2D, M * dmdT * transpose(Winv), grad );
00251       // calculate 2D hessian
00252     second_deriv_wrt_product_factor( d2mdT2, Winv );
00253     const size_t n = num_idx*(num_idx+1)/2;
00254     hess2d.resize(n);
00255     if (n)
00256       hessian<2>( num_idx, mDerivs2D, d2mdT2, arrptr(hess2d) );
00257       // calculate surface hessian as transform of 2D hessian
00258     Hessian.resize(n);
00259     for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00260       Hessian[i] = Matrix3D( (M * hess2d[i] * transpose(M)).data() );
00261 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00262     print_info<2>( e, s, J, Wp, A * inverse(W) );
00263 #endif
00264 #endif
00265   }
00266   else {
00267     assert(0);
00268     return false;
00269   }
00270   
00271     // pass back index list
00272   indices.resize( num_idx );
00273   std::copy( mIndices, mIndices+num_idx, indices.begin() );
00274   
00275     // apply target weight to value
00276   if (!num_idx) 
00277     weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, 0, 0, 0, err );
00278   else
00279     weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, arrptr(grad), 0, arrptr(Hessian), err ); 
00280   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00281   return rval;
00282 }

00284 
00285 bool TQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( 
00286                                            PatchData& pd,
00287                                            size_t handle,
00288                                            double& value,
00289                                            std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00290                                            std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00291                                            std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& diagonal,
00292                                            MsqError& err )
00293 {
00294   const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handle );
00295   const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handle );
00296   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( e );
00297   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00298   unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00299   size_t num_idx = 0;
00300   const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00301   
00302   bool rval;
00303   if (edim == 3) { // 3x3 or 3x2 targets ?
00304     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00305     if (!mf) {
00306       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00307       return false;
00308     }
00309 
00310     MsqMatrix<3,3> A, W, dmdT, d2mdT2[6];
00311     mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, mIndices, mDerivs3D, num_idx, A, err );
00312     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00313     targetCalc->get_3D_target( pd, e, s, W, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00314     const MsqMatrix<3,3> Winv = inverse(W);
00315     const MsqMatrix<3,3> T = A*Winv;
00316     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_hess( T, value, dmdT, d2mdT2, err );
00317     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00318     gradient<3>( num_idx, mDerivs3D, dmdT * transpose(Winv), grad );
00319     second_deriv_wrt_product_factor( d2mdT2, Winv );
00320     
00321     diagonal.resize( num_idx );
00322     hessian_diagonal<3>(num_idx, mDerivs3D, d2mdT2, arrptr(diagonal) );
00323 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00324     print_info<3>( e, s, A, W, A * inverse(W) );
00325 #endif
00326   }
00327   else if (edim == 2) {
00328 #ifdef NUMERICAL_2D_HESSIAN
00329     // use finite diference approximation for now
00330     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, handle,
00331                                            value, indices, grad, diagonal,
00332                                            err );
00333 #else
00334     MsqMatrix<2,2> W, A, dmdT, d2mdT2[3];
00335     MsqMatrix<3,2> M;
00336     rval = evaluate_surface_common( pd, s, e, bits, mIndices, num_idx,
00337                              mDerivs2D, W, A, M, err ); 
00338     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00339       return false;
00340     const MsqMatrix<2,2> Winv = inverse(W);
00341     const MsqMatrix<2,2> T = A*Winv;
00342     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_hess( T, value, dmdT, d2mdT2, err );
00343     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00344     gradient<2>( num_idx, mDerivs2D, M * dmdT * transpose(Winv), grad );
00345     second_deriv_wrt_product_factor( d2mdT2, Winv );
00346 
00347     diagonal.resize( num_idx );
00348     for (size_t i = 0; i < num_idx; ++i) {
00349       MsqMatrix<2,2> block2d;
00350       block2d(0,0) = transpose(mDerivs2D[i]) * d2mdT2[0] * mDerivs2D[i];
00351       block2d(0,1) = transpose(mDerivs2D[i]) * d2mdT2[1] * mDerivs2D[i];
00352       block2d(1,0) = block2d(0,1);
00353       block2d(1,1) = transpose(mDerivs2D[i]) * d2mdT2[2] * mDerivs2D[i];
00354       MsqMatrix<3,2> p = M * block2d;
00355       
00356       SymMatrix3D& H = diagonal[i];
00357       H[0] = p.row(0) * transpose(M.row(0));
00358       H[1] = p.row(0) * transpose(M.row(1));
00359       H[2] = p.row(0) * transpose(M.row(2));
00360       H[3] = p.row(1) * transpose(M.row(1));
00361       H[4] = p.row(1) * transpose(M.row(2));
00362       H[5] = p.row(2) * transpose(M.row(2));
00363     }
00364 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00365     print_info<2>( e, s, J, Wp, A * inverse(W) );
00366 #endif
00367 #endif
00368   }
00369   else {
00370     assert(0);
00371     return false;
00372   }
00373   
00374     // pass back index list
00375   indices.resize( num_idx );
00376   std::copy( mIndices, mIndices+num_idx, indices.begin() );
00377   
00378     // apply target weight to value
00379   if (!num_idx) 
00380     weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, 0, 0, 0, err );
00381   else
00382     weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, arrptr(grad), arrptr(diagonal), 0, err ); 
00383   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00384   return rval;
00385 }
